name: Doflamingo
text: These terms have always changed throughout the course of history!

name: Doflamingo
text: Kids who have never seen peace and kids who have never seen war have different values!

name: Doflamingo
text: Those who stand at the top determine what's wrong and what's right!

name: Doflamingo
text: This very place is neutral ground!

name: Doflamingo
text: Whoever wins this war becomes justice!
